content: **grab your free scarf pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** the winter frost scarf is a quick and easy crochet pattern that makes a beautiful winter accessory or a thoughtful handmade gift designed with worsted weight yarn and a 6 mm j hook this scarf works up in just a few hours the finished size is 5 5 inches wide by 59 inches long but the pattern includes instructions to customize it to any length or width even a blanket perfect for winter it pairs beautifully with the matching winter frost hat pattern publish date december 22nd **join
